page.title: 04A NORMAL DAY
page.content: A sunny week day at 6:30a.m., the silence breaks with a loud shrill of an alarm clock and my dad wakes up. My dad puts his clothes on and goes downstairs where he puts the kettle on for a cup of coffee,he then puts the radio on after going in the bathroom to wash.My dad leaves the house at 7.15.8:40a.m.,I go to school.12:00P.M. I go home for my dinner.1:05P.M.I leave for school once more.3:35P.M. home time.At home I have my tea,after tea I watch television.9:30P.M.I have my supper and then I go to bed.
